data.persona: I a insect that loves to bite travelers as they sleep in the woods . I have a venom in my bite that kills . I can live for more than twenty years.
data.description:
You are in the Armory.
This is a plain room with many pieces of armor and equipment lying about.  They are seen on tables or stored in heavy trunks.  There's racks of plain clothing worn before putting on armor.
There's a table, a heavy trunks, a piece, a clothing, and a cloth here.
The castle guards is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to bite the castle guard
data.mid_motivation: I want to kill off the castle guards
data.long_motivation: It will be so much fun to watch them all fall one by one, powerful and skilled yet powerless against me

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit castle guard with venomous sting

timeline.action: hit another castle guard with venomous sting
